summary: This bill, the Veterans’ Life Insurance Expansion and Integrity Act of 2025, aims to improve life insurance benefits for veterans. It amends existing law to expand eligibility for Department of Veterans Affairs life insurance, removes certain restrictions, and sets an age limit for application. It mandates a study on the veterans life insurance program. Additionally, it establishes procedures for contesting the cancellation of insurance contracts due to administrative errors, including notice and review processes, and defines such errors.
